name: Christmas Mystery
description:
You were sent to stop Michal from ruining berne, and to collect all the lego blocks that you have to get to the children. But besidesMichal you will have to fight other things like hunger and cold.

----------------------

CONTROLS

----------------------

MOVE - WASD

COLLECT-RIGHT CLICK

MENU-M

OPEN/INTERACT-E

SHOOT SNOWBALL-Q

SHOOT GOLDEN BULLETS-R
